item.title: New Website!
item.description: Welcome to the new Lasseigne Lab website! While still under construction, we wanted to share a first post about our new team! (left to right) Tabea Soelter, Jen Fisher, and Jordan Whitlock We’ve been fortunate to recruit such a strong, interdisciplinary team. This past summer we welcomed Sasha Thalluri and Avery Williams, two undergraduate genetics research assistants enthusiastic to learn more about science and the lab environment. Shortly after, Randi Wood joined as a staff scientist and our lab manager.

item.title: Contact Us
item.description: The Lasseigne Lab is in the Cell, Developmental and Integrative Biology Department at The University of Alabama at Birmingham School of Medicine. Our lab is located on the 9th floor of Tinsley Harrison Tower in 960. Contact PI Dr. Brittany Lasseigne at bnp0001@uab.edu
